actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide for the rank of major general for the Chief of the Dental Service of the Air Force.

summary.text: Provides for the rank of major general for the Chief of the Dental Service of the Air Force, who is to be appointed by the President with the advise and consent of the Senate. (Adds 10 U.S.C. 8037)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide for the rank of major general for the Chief of the Dental Service of the Air Force.
